source.df000300: This statement is surprisingly true for 88% of these 8124 mushrooms (23 species of gilled mushrooms in the Agaricus and Lepiota Family). Let me show you!
source.901b8efb: See, If you only eat none smelling mushrooms, you are 88 percent likely to survive!
source.9126bba8: You can see below there is a strong positive correlation between edible mushrooms and none smelling mushrooms.
source.429089ef: If Mushroom Smells Nothing Than It Is Edible
